channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Do Not Kill
item.description: The British debate doctor-assisted suicide, even while advocates try to hide what it is.

item.title: Welker Suggests Trump Will Suppress Free Speech: All The Questions From Meet The Press
item.description: She asks Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro if he believes the Trump administration is, 'trying to stifle dissent and people who would disagree.'

item.title: Trump to honor allies, award Ben Carson with the Presidential Medal of Freedom
item.description: President Trump announced Saturday that he will award Ben Carson the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest civilian honor.

item.title: The Wrong Tool for Protecting Women from Abortion
item.description: There is no reliable evidence that prosecuting women would lead to the elimination of abortion.

item.title: Jonathan Karl Blames Trump For Kimmel’s Suspension: All The Questions From ABC’s This Week
item.description: Remove the answers and leave just the questions, and Jonathan and Karl’s blatant anti-Trump tone is easy to spot.

item.title: Colleges hustle to adapt as Trump administration reshapes higher education
item.description: Colleges nationwide are scrambling to adjust to the Trump administration's overhaul of higher education as the fall semester has kicked into gear, and...

item.title: ‘Nonpartisan’ Voter Registration Groups Target Likely-Democrat Voters In Virginia Elections
item.description: The Voter Participation Center and Center for Voter Information are targeting likely-Dem voters in Virginia's fall elections.

item.title: The Roots of Trans Fanaticism
item.description: Why is the trans cause advanced with such fever and hate?

item.title: South Korean President Lee raises concerns about U.S. investment demand
item.description: South Korean President Lee Jae-myung says his country could face a financial crisis if it accepts the Trump administration's investment demands withou...

item.title: Margaret Brennan Suggests Israel Is Aggressor In War Against Hamas: All The Questions From Face The Nation
item.description: Packaged around the interview is a report showing the difficult conditions in Gaza, but no Israeli perspective.

item.title: Trump calls Charlie Kirk, 'a martyr,' one of 'America's greatest patriots'
item.description: President Trump declared Charlie Kirk "one of America's greatest patriots," heaping lavish praise on the slain conservative activist, who was assassin...

item.title: 100 Million Witness The Power Of The Gospel, Forgiveness At Charlie Kirk Memorial
item.description: The powerful event was a testament to Kirk's life and faith.

item.title: Erika Kirk says she forgives husband's assassin
item.description: In a stunning moment, the widow of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk said at his funeral that she forgives her husband's assassin.

item.title: We Can Smash Antifa Without Designating Them
item.description: The tools are already in the hands of law enforcement to treat violent members of Antifa with the seriousness they deserve.

item.title: The Fed Should Do One Thing — and One Thing Only
item.description: We don’t want a Democratic Fed or a Republican Fed. We want an American Fed.
